successes.title: 99% Invisible: Season 4- Weekly!
successes.description: Season 4 of the award-winning radio show about design, architecture and the 99% Invisible activity that shapes our world.

Pledges.description: 99% Invisible "Map of the City" desktop graphic designed by Steve McCarthy. The digital wallpaper pack will include the poster optimized to various screen resolutions and sizes, including iPad and iPhone.
Notebook: One (1) new 99% Invisible pocket-sized notebook designed by Andy Mangold based on an episode from Season 3. Grid paper inside. Cover selection randomly chosen by us.
Notebook 3-Pack: Three new 99% Invisible pocket-sized notebooks designed by Andy Mangold based on episodes from Season 3 (Heyoon, Dazzle, Secret Staircases). Graph paper inside.
Architecture Alphabet poster. They're back! Don't miss out. This is the most requested piece of merchandise since the last campaign. Perfect for the architecture lover in your life.
Signed copy of Debbie Millman's new book, Self Portrait As Your Traitor.
Stephen Wildish's new "Designer" poster. Minimalist renderings of world changing designs and the designer who made them.
99% Invisible "Map of the City" poster designed by Steve McCarthy.
Razzle Dazzle t-shirt. Never be hit by a torpedo again!
"Always Read the Plaque" t-shirt. A reminder to everyone about the 99% Invisible prime directive.
Stephen Wildish poster combo. Get both the "Architecture Alphabet" and the "Designer" poster.
Two t-shirts! Pick two of either the 99% logo, Dazzle, or Plaque t-shirt. We'll send you a survey after the campaign is over to get which two shirts and sizes you want.

99% Invisible Fan Pack: Pick one t-shirt, pick one poster, plus get the new 3-pack of Season 3 episode notebooks. We'll send you a survey after the campaign is over so you can pick your shirt, size, and which poster you want.

Three shirts! Get all three t-shirts (99% logo, Dazzle, and Plaque) or some combination (e.g. two Dazzles and one Plaque). We'll send you a survey after the campaign is over to get which shirts and sizes you want.

99% Invisible One-of-Everything Pack: One each of every reward! One 99% Invisible logo t-shirt, one Dazzle t-shirt, one Plaque t-shirt, one "Architecture Alphabet" poster, one "Designer" poster, one "Map of the City" poster, plus the new 3-pack of Season 3 episode notebooks.

99% Invisible Two-of-Everything Pack! Double the above (6 shirts, 6 posters, 6 notebooks), PLUS a custom recording by Roman Mars of your choosing (voicemail message, short story, etc. for noncommercial purposes).

Be a 99% Invisible producer for a day! Come to the office, chime in during the story meeting, listen to the rough cut of whatever we're working on, go out to lunch with us, and take home a One-of-Everything Pack of all the swag. You have to get yourself here and find a place to stay. We'll select  several dates for you to choose from to make it fit your schedule.

Underwriting Spot/Dedication: one 20-second spot from your company or group, read by Roman on the podcast. Message must adhere to public radio underwriting guidelines. Plus, we'll throw in a 99% Invisible Fan Pack. Email to discuss details: roman@prx.org

Four (4) Underwriting Spots + a live 99% Invisible presentation for your group or company anywhere in the world. Roman's transportation and lodging are additional, unless you're in the San Francisco Bay Area. Note: this rate is about 1/2 the price of what this would cost outside of the Kickstarter campaign, so grab it now! Email to discuss details: roman@prx.org
